Count and normalize ChIP-seq read coverage

Source: R/chip_utils.R
count_normalize_chip.Rd

Count and normalize ChIP-seq read coverage

count_normalize_chip(
  sites_file,
  chip_bam_files,
  chip_idxstats_files,
  chrom_size_file,
  ref.size = 1e+07,
  transform = c("none", "asinh", "log2", "sqrt"),
  bedtools_path = "bedtools"
)

Arguments

sites_file

File containing the candidate sites.

chip_bam_files

ChIP-seq bam files.

chip_idxstats_files

ChIP-seq idxstats files. By default, use the corresponding '.idxstats.txt' files in the same directory of the bam files.

chrom_size_file

Chromosome size file.

ref.size

ChIP-Seq reference library size (Default: 10 million)

transform

Type of transformation for the ChIP read counts. Options are 'none' (do not transform), 'asinh', 'log2', and 'sqrt'.

bedtools_path

Path to bedtools executable

Contents
